texts.Home.Hero.Title:
Become a Professional
English Teacher
texts.Home.Hero.Subtitle: Get a globally recognized TESOL certificate from LTi Australia in just 200 hours of study and practice.
texts.Home.Hero.Stats.Students.Label: Graduated Students
texts.Home.Hero.Stats.Experience.Label: Experience
texts.Home.Hero.Stats.Satisfaction.Label: Student Satisfaction
texts.Home.About.Label: About Us
texts.Home.About.Title: Introduction to LTi Australia
texts.Home.About.Description: LTi Australia is a leading organization in the field of TESOL training, recognized for excellence and innovation in language education.
texts.Home.About.Highlight: Below are some key highlights about LTI:
texts.Home.About.Features.Founded.Title: Established
texts.Home.About.Features.Founded.Description: LTi is a pioneer in TESOL training and developed the first official Australian TESOL Certificate in 1996.
texts.Home.About.Features.Registration.Title: Registration
texts.Home.About.Features.Registration.Descrip: Officially registered as an Australian Government Registered Training Organisation (RTO No. 30173) since 1998.
texts.Home.About.Features.Experience.Title: Experience
texts.Home.About.Features.Experience.Descripti: Over 28 years of trusted reputation both nationally and internationally in TESOL training.
texts.Home.About.Features.Partners.Title: Partner Organizations
texts.Home.About.Features.Partners.Description: 50 organizations have utilized LTi’s TESOL courses and resources.
texts.Home.About.Features.Impact.Title: Reach
texts.Home.About.Features.Impact.Description: Trained over 16,000 students worldwide, including both native and non-native English speakers.
texts.Home.About.Features.Subsidiary.Title: Division Of
texts.Home.About.Features.Subsidiary.Descripti: LTi is a division of Universal Education and Training Ltd. (ABN: 75 090 720 086).
texts.Home.About.Footer: In Vietnam, TESOL Channel is proud to be the official distributor of LTi Australia, delivering top-quality TESOL Online programs and connecting with English language centers and universities across the country. We are committed to accompanying you on your journey to becoming a professional English teacher with globally recognized certification.
texts.Home.Schedule.Label: Study Time
texts.Home.Schedule.Title:
Flexible Schedule,
Suitable for Everyone
texts.Home.Schedule.Description: LTi's Online TESOL program offers a flexible schedule, allowing you to study in the morning, afternoon, or evening based on your needs and timetable. Additionally, you will be provided with a lifelong account, enabling you to review and access materials at any time for study and reference.
texts.Home.Schedule.Morning.Title: Morning
texts.Home.Schedule.Afternoon.Title: Afternoon
texts.Home.Schedule.Evening.Title: Evening
texts.Home.Teachers.Label: Our Teachers
texts.Home.Teachers.Title:
Professional Teachers
from LTi
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature1: The program is directly taught by a team of professional and experienced teachers from LTi Australia.
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature2: These educators will guide and support you throughout the learning process, ensuring you effectively absorb the knowledge.
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature3: With a flexible schedule and professional guidance from LTi Australia, the TESOL Online program promises to provide you with an excellent learning experience.
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature4: Contact us now to register and start your journey to becoming a professional English teacher!
texts.Course.Hero.Label: What is TESOL?
texts.Course.Hero.Title: Overview of the TESOL International Certificate Online Program
texts.Course.Hero.Description: The TESOL International Certificate program by LTi Australia helps learners achieve an international certification and develop comprehensive teaching skills. It equips educators with the essential knowledge and abilities to succeed in diverse teaching environments.
texts.Course.Benefits.Curriculum.Title: English Curriculum
texts.Course.Benefits.Curriculum.Description: All course materials are developed by LTi Australia, updated with modern knowledge and aligned with global teaching trends.
texts.Course.Benefits.Teachers.Title: International Instructors
texts.Course.Benefits.Teachers.Description: Our teaching team consists of native speakers with extensive experience, who provide live online lessons and ongoing support throughout the course.
texts.Course.Benefits.Support.Title: Personalized Support
texts.Course.Benefits.Support.Description: Students receive individualized guidance and answers to their questions, ensuring they master essential knowledge and skills.
texts.Course.Benefits.Certificate.Title: International Certificate
texts.Course.Benefits.Certificate.Description: Upon completion, students will receive a TESOL certificate issued by LTi Australia, widely recognized around the world.
texts.Course.Benefits.Materials.Title: Learning Materials
texts.Course.Benefits.Materials.Description: Students receive a complimentary 335-page hardcover TESOL study book, exclusively compiled by LTi, to support both their learning and future teaching.
texts.Course.Benefits.LifetimeAccess.Title: Personal Account
texts.Course.Benefits.LifetimeAccess.Descripti: Registered students at LTi receive a personal account, allowing them to study anytime. All lessons are designed and thoroughly guided by LTi’s experienced instructors, ensuring effective learning.
texts.Course.Content.Label: Our Course
texts.Course.Content.Title: Course Content
texts.Course.Content.Description: The program includes 8 in-depth modules and 9 hours of practical training, helping learners develop comprehensive English teaching skills.
texts.Course.Content.Module1.Title: Culture & Learning
texts.Course.Content.Module1.Description: Explore the connection between communication, culture, and learning; learn how to manage diverse classrooms and create an inclusive learning environment that respects all learning styles.
texts.Course.Content.Module2.Title: English Language Analysis
texts.Course.Content.Module2.Description: Discover the functional nature of the English language, equipping skills to analyze the structure and language of texts for more effective teaching.
texts.Course.Content.Module3.Title: Basic Grammar Knowledge
texts.Course.Content.Module3.Description: Develop in-depth grammar knowledge, learn to clearly convey the role of grammar, and introduce grammar concepts to students.
texts.Course.Content.Module4.Title: Speaking & Pronunciation Strategies & Skills
texts.Course.Content.Module4.Description: Guide on teaching speaking and pronunciation skills, organizing engaging lessons, and finding suitable materials to improve learners’ communication abilities.
texts.Course.Content.Module5.Title: Listening Strategies & Skills
texts.Course.Content.Module5.Description: Teach how to develop students’ listening skills through social communication lessons, focusing on accuracy and fluency.
texts.Course.Content.Module6.Title: Reading Strategies & Skills
texts.Course.Content.Module6.Description: Support students in recognizing the English alphabet and symbols, designing dynamic reading lessons to develop effective reading skills.
texts.Course.Content.Module7.Title: Writing Strategies & Skills
texts.Course.Content.Module7.Description: Guide students from forming letters to structuring essays, applying practical techniques to develop writing skills.
texts.Course.Content.Module8.Title: Teaching English Online
texts.Course.Content.Module8.Description: Equip skills for online teaching, integrating technology, and adapting teaching styles to suit the online learning environment.
texts.Course.Practical.Tesol.Heading: Looking for a Higher TESOL Course?
texts.Course.Practical.Tesol.Contact: Please contact Tesol Channel to receive expert advice and the best support with registration.
texts.Course.Practical.Label: Practical Activities
texts.Course.Practical.Title: Practical Training
texts.Course.Practical.Description: Learners will participate in 9 hours of hands-on practice in real teaching environments, applying the knowledge gained to build experience. Upon completion, you will confidently step into live or online classrooms worldwide while enhancing your personal profile.
texts.Course.Practical.Note: Note: When enrolling in a course, you can freely choose a nearby support center to receive practical guidance.
texts.Register.Pricing.Title: Full Course Tuition
texts.Register.Pricing.Subtitle: LTi Australia's International TESOL Certificate course helps students achieve international certification and develop comprehensive teaching skills at a super competitive price.
texts.Register.Pricing.Label: All-inclusive Fee
texts.Register.Requirements.Title: Requirements for TESOL Online Course Registration
texts.Register.Requirements.Requirement1: Meet basic English proficiency criteria (an entrance test may be required if necessary).
texts.Register.Requirements.Requirement2: Commit to completing the full program and practical training.
texts.Register.Requirements.Requirement3: Agree with all the LTi Australia policies.
texts.Register.Requirements.Requirement4: Tuition fees are collected as per LTi Australia’s regulations, ensuring transparency.
texts.Register.Requirements.Requirement5: TESOL Channel assists with fee collection and guides learners through the registration process.
texts.Register.Form.Title: How to Register
texts.Register.Form.Subtitle: Register here or contact the nearest partner center for consultation and quick registration support.
texts.Register.Form.TermsLabel: Terms & Conditions: Click to view/Click to agree.
texts.Register.Form.TermsRequired: Please agree to the terms and conditions
texts.Register.Form.FillRequired: Please fill in all required information
texts.Partner.List.Subtitle: Our Partners
texts.Partner.List.Title: Our Partners
texts.Partner.List.Description1: We are proud to distribute our program nationwide, connecting with trusted partner centers to provide the best support for you. With an extensive network, our professional team is always ready to listen and assist you throughout your learning journey.
texts.Partner.List.Description2: Contact us, and we commit to accompanying you on your path to learning and development.
texts.Partner.LocationFilter.Label: Select location
texts.Partner.Become.Subtitle: Become part of us
texts.Partner.Become.Title: Want to become our partner?
texts.Partner.Become.Description: TESOL Channel seeks collaboration with reputable centers and schools that prioritize quality to distribute LTi Australia's TESOL Online programs not only across Vietnam but also globally. By working together, we create opportunities for growth, adaptation, and success in the dynamic field of English language education.

texts.Employment.Title: Job Support
texts.Employment.Hero.Subtitle: Career after completion?
texts.Employment.Hero.Title: Post-course Job Support
texts.Employment.Hero.Description1: TESOL Channel is committed to supporting you in finding a job even after completing the course..
texts.Employment.Hero.Description2: TESOL Channel will connect you with job opportunities at companies, English centers, and schools both domestically and internationally. We have an extensive network of partners ready to recommend you for suitable positions.
texts.Employment.Form.Subtitle: Registration Guide
texts.Employment.Form.Title: How to Register
texts.Employment.Form.Description: If you need assistance in finding a job after completing the course, please leave your information with us.
texts.Employment.Form.SuccessMessage: Your employment support registration has been submitted successfully. We will contact you soon.
texts.AboutUs.Hero.Label: What is TESOL Channel?
texts.AboutUs.Hero.Title: TESOL Channel
texts.AboutUs.Hero.Description: TESOL Channel – The official and exclusive distributor of LTi's TESOL Online program in Vietnam.
texts.AboutUs.Vision.Title: Vision
texts.AboutUs.Vision.Description: To become the leading organization in Vietnam in providing high-quality online TESOL training programs from LTi Australia, helping to enhance English teaching competencies and support career development for teachers nationwide.
texts.AboutUs.Mission.Title: Mission
texts.AboutUs.Mission.Point1: To deliver internationally accredited online TESOL programs from LTi Australia, tailored to the learning and development needs of English teachers in Vietnam.
texts.AboutUs.Mission.Point2: To support learners in building a solid foundation of knowledge, modern teaching skills, and creative thinking within a global educational environment.
texts.AboutUs.Mission.Point3: To ensure professional, dedicated support services and to accompany learners throughout their studies and career development.
texts.AboutUs.Values.Title: Core Values
texts.AboutUs.Values.Quality.Title: Quality:
texts.AboutUs.Values.Quality.Description: Committed to providing training programs of the highest standards, ensuring practical value and effectiveness for learners.
texts.AboutUs.Values.Innovation.Title: Innovation:
texts.AboutUs.Values.Innovation.Description: Continuously updating and applying advanced teaching methods in line with global educational trends.
texts.AboutUs.Values.Dedication.Title: Dedication:
texts.AboutUs.Values.Dedication.Description: Placing the interests and development of learners first, accompanying them on their journey to achieve career goals.
texts.AboutUs.Values.Cooperation.Title: Collaboration:
texts.AboutUs.Values.Cooperation.Description: Building sustainable relationships with partners, learners, and the educational community for mutual growth.
texts.AboutUs.Values.Sustainability.Title: Sustainable Development:
texts.AboutUs.Values.Sustainability.Descriptio: Contributing to the long-term advancement of English education in Vietnam through high-quality training programs.
texts.Contact.Subtitle: Contact Us
